title: Guinsoo's Rageblade bug or not?
body:
So after playing some games as the champion Aatrox, I've noticed a bug or maybe a glitch when i purchased Guinsoo's Rageblade{{item:3124}} . As we know Aatrox's W passive is; "While toggled on Aatrox deals bonus damage and fills up a portion of his Blood Well every third subsequent attack. While toggled off Aatrox restores health." Here is my issue, Aatrox's W ability tells us it activates every third subsequent attack, however with a purchase of Guinsoo's Rageblade this reduces Aatrox's W passive to toggle every second subsequent attack. Please look into this Riot :)

-Sincerely FattyArbuckle123 {{summoner:31}}

replies.body: Can I just clarify first, you know how Guinsoos works right?

Guinsoo procs onhit effects, not on attack effects, aatrox w is onhit, but the way aatrox w tooltip is worded, it sounds as if it is on attack effect not onhit. Its just confusion of wording, but it isn't a bug.
would that mean if guinsoos was to apply as aatrox extra on hit dmg was to it would apply twice, but it would never apply 2 stacks?
His stacks for heal or damage is onhit, but his damage and heal is on attack, so he stacks twice as fast, but does not damage or heal for double
oh, lol, from a person thats only seen him once since the rework, thank you
his w has always been like that
